entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
